values:
today was nice...saw linda, nikki and jim....got lunch at johnny rockets...drove around doing errands...went back to lindas, looked at myspace..:)....nikki and i decided to go to the movies....saw pirates 2....so good...amazingly good...i think i developed a crush on orlando bloom..so hot....today i realized who my true friends are..especially the ones who have time for me...im gonna try one last time for a few friends and then its done...in fact i think they have done that to me anywayz...so yah..i hope everyone is doing good...luv u all...


&heartsT♥

Happy 4th of July...to everyone..I went to the beach today..it was nice..i think i got burnt which sucks....umm yah life is ok right now...not getting enuf hrs at work....but i got my 4 year raise which was nice...so i hope i can pay for school ok....i get to find out where i am on the waiting list for bsc..i really dont want to leave at home...but if i do..it will be cheaper..if not ill have to leave walmart and find another job....hmmm..finally got my birth certificate so i can get my permit and then eventually get my license..yah i know im late with everything...better late than never right...


ok hope everyone is good...


♥ T

Today is my first day off and I am going to try and enjoy it. It is hard to type when u have band aids on ur three broken nails...ughhh..i need to get them done....real soon..cuz it looks like shit with bandaids on them let me tell you..

Ok but anywayz...ive had a thought..i want to go to an amusement park...anyone interested..i have no transportation so i would have to hitch a ride with someone...and i want to go to the beach....a lot...my days off are tues and wed and i have sat and sun nights off so i wanna chill with my friends....call my cell if interested...


hope everyone is enjoying their day....

Sometimes I wonder about myself..whats my real importance right now...i cant seem to find it....maybe its not my time to find out....

life is so complicated.....but we all have to put up with it..some better than others....

...at this moment...why should i bother?

last nite was great..and awkward...shopping with nikki was a blast...i wish i had more money though...i got shirts and i came there for shoes...i saw some nice ass sneakers..and i saw mad hats that i wanted...damn to be rich...that would be great....i can only dream...and i guess save my money....i bought more shirts at work today...i hope i dont spent all my money this summer..i need to save...for school....well yah i still have a lot of shit on my mind....friends and love....it hurts my head to think about it...i want to have fun this summer though....i want to go to the beach..and maybe to an amusement park....ooo that sounds fun...i just need some ppl to go with...anyone want to join me...and i still need to get my birth certificate which really sucks....i cant do anything without it...i want to go to the club...i want to drive legally..lol..\

hopefully i can get this shit done b4 the end of the summer...i want to be a 20 year old not a 13 year old...

hope everyone enjoyed their day...

well i just need to get some shit off my chest and i guess this is the place that im gonna do  it...


girls are bitches and talk so much shit its unbelievable...its sad to say that ur own best friend is two-faced and tells all of ur business to ppl...and then my other best friend is just i dunno...gives u so much shit about how u dont tell her shit and she has to find out from my other best friend....its like shut the fuck up please..im grown i can make my own decisions...giving advice is great..it doesnt meant that i have to take it everything single time ya know....i am my own person...give me a break sometimes...i want to just live and take things as they come...im tired of being sheltered..ya know


ive come to the point that im just going to keep everything to myself ..its sad i cant tell my own best friends the happy points in my life....i guess that is what journals are for right lol

but ya i really like someone right now and i just wish if ppl had some thoughts on it tell it to myself dont talk about me in front of my fuckin job and let ppl hear...they are very lucky it was one of my friends that heard them....damn girls like to gossip huh

yah but thats my rant..deal with it

happy new year...no midnight kiss for me...cuz my baby is at work...i miss him...i got to see him though :)....im at home bored out of my mind but thats alrite....my best buddy....i love hanging with you...i wish you invited me tonite....but whateva..what can u do....well hope everyone else is having a good nite...oh yah..my new  years resolution is to lose 20 lbs..i bought exercise dvds and im going on a diet...ok well peace...

Damn....what a crappy ass day this has been....dave broke up with me today...informing that he is joining the military and that he just wants to be friends with me......it hurts so much.........my girl glendaly was on the fone with me trying to  get my mind off of it...thanks girl...my heart is completely in pieces......i know its nothing that i did....hes going through problems and this is a drastic measure that he has to take..and it sucks so much...i finally figured it out though....he has been relying on me and all of his friends for money and favors ....that he so sick of it..he wants to be independent.....and it hurts me so much that he has to do it this way......i just talked to him on the fone...and i soon as i heard his voice i started balling my eyes out...i want him to be happy and he wants me to be happy....the whole situation just sucks....going to work is gonna suck 2morrow....cuz thats where we basically got together.....damn.....what did i do to deserve this.....he called me buddy on the fone and that made me cry.....hes likes ill always love you and im sry for all the pain im putting u through...but i have to do this for myself....and then it sucked when we hung up the fone cuz there was no i love you at the end...and god that was the worst...i cant look at anything the same again...he always used to come into my house and climb intp bed with me and just hold me...i was the happiest person in the world when i was in his arms....

 

 

thanks to everyone who has comforted me in anyway today...ill get through this somehow...i dunno how long this is gonna take but.....i dunno...

its been ova a month since ive updated...

right now....the one person...who can always make me smile...made me feel like complete shit....and which makes it even worse is that he probably doesnt know how upset i am right now...i call him my best friend in my eyes..but i probably will neva get that title said about me....whateva....
Awwwww...how good it feels to be able to make love.....what a great nite...movies and love...can't get betta than that...

When you think you know someone.....everything can change one day..with a little phone call and your opinion of this so-called heroic person shreds into pieces...my wonderful friend....there will always be love...but i can neva look at them the same way....at first i was extremely depressed..then depression turned into pure anger...all those times i was there....and then to do that...behind my back...there are no words...it creates a pain in my heart that will probably linger for a very long time...the situation sucks all together..

LJ Interests meme results

  1. adidas:
    my favorite shoe brand..just bought missy ones a few weeks ago...and a nice ass outfit to go with
  2. chocolate:
    my favorite thing to eat....so delicious...can't go a day without it...
  3. clothes:
    i need some more of those...i neva seem to have any....
  4. colorguard:
    miss it dearly...
  5. cookies:
    yummy..i'm mad that i bought some and left them at work...grrr....
  6. dance team:
    hahahahaha....started it...created a dance and then it was basically taken away....
  7. dancing:
    need to get back into it...miss it so much...
  8. dave:
    the love in my life...my sweetheart...full of drama..but arent we all...i love him to pieces...claims we will be together foreva..and that we are stuck together.....
  9. eminem:
    one of the greatest rappers of all time...needs to come with a new record....
  10. family:
    love em to death..right now going through some shit with my immediate family it sucks...but what can you do...

Enter your LJ user name, and 10 interests will be selected from your interest list.
Well...ya...I've just been working alot....nothing too exciting...losing friends and gaining friends....but life goes on right....

I haven't really done anything too fun this summer so I was wondering if anyone out there would want to go to an amusement park b4 the summer starts...and ppl go back to college..it's just a lot...i had my eye on canobie lake park...i just wanted to get together with my peeps b4 everyone leaves me yet again...ok holla back if interested
<marquee>Happy Birthday Rachel! I  miss u so  much!!!!!!!!!!!!!!</marquee>

Hey...what a amazing night I had...and I spend it all with my wondeful but difficult boyfriend..

We were supposed to go to the beach today but our plans changed because his mother had to use the car...so I walked up to his house instead and just laid with him....had some nice times with him....XXXXXX.....was very tired though from working his long shifts so he slept most of the time. Finally..got his car back...ate dinner b4 going to the movies..We ended up seeing War of the Worlds....really good movie....amazing effects...TOm Cruise was looking mighty fine too...

I love spending time with Dave when it is just the two of us....

I thought as I woke up @ 6am that today wouldn't go the way that I wanted it to...it turned out incredible to my surprise.

1) Woke Dave up...took a shower..he called me to see if I was up..and I was...he was the one I thought would fall back asleep...called me again to see if I had left...walked to the commuter rail station. I talked to him on the fone til I got there. He looked so cute from far away and was even more handsome as I got closer. He couldn't take his eyes off me..made me feel sexy..

2) Waited for the train for about 20 minutes..Dave ate a couple of the sandwiches that I made him..Got on the train...explained to him a little of what I was planning on showing him. Got off and found the red line train with ease...

3) Finally..got to Park Street....around like 8:30...he had to go to the bathroom which got me upset for some odd reason...had to go in mcdonalds..even though it was for customers only...talked to him and said let's not fight..and have a good day...

4) Walked through Boston Common...it was really beautiful...not to hot yet...Dave seemed to get distracted by the crazy people walking...sat down so dave could have another sandwich...I just loved walking with him...it was nice to have someone who wanted to hold my hand constantly.

5) Walked through the Public Gardens...decided we were gonna go on the Swan Boat...didn't open til 10 so we walked around some..sat down on a bench cuz he wanted to tell me how much I meant to him...he didn't want to give me a card..would rather talk to me from his heart I guess...almost made me cry...I really think we needed this day..to get away from everyone...ya know

6) Went on the Swan Boat....romantic...he seemed to like it a lot which made me happy...

7) Sat down yet again...we ate a sandwich and had a little break b4 going down Newbury St. Damn...Newbury St. is a bitch and a half. So damn long..well we were looking for a store...CONDOMWORLD...and it just happened to be like almost at the end of the street. By that time.. it was like 95 degrees out and we had to stop and get some drinks. 

8) Condomworld was pretty interesting...didn't have that much so all we got was 2 flavored condoms...promised myself that I would go back there.

9) Walked to Copley Place...love talking to him while we walked..he didn't complain once...I was so proud of him...I kept asking him if he was ok though...got to the mall..went through the whole thing just to get to the Cheesecake Factory.

10) Got some cheesecake..ate it outside..Dave was a little upset about how pricey the slices were..."We could have gotten this at Shaw's" I told him that the whole point of going to Boston was to spend as much money as we could...he understood..once he tasted the cheesecake.

11)Went in a few stores...walked all the way back to Park St. and took the train to South Station..we got there around 2:30..so we had some time b4 the 3:10 train to Holbrook..Dave was looking mad tired..he put his head down on the table we were sitting at...almost missed our train too..had to run...we both looked so drained..

12) Decided that we didn't want the day to be ova..thought about going in the pool and the watching a movie...got rid of the movies idea cuz we really didn't have that much money..after some conflict with his mother..we got picked up around 3:30. 

13) Got our bathing suits at my house and went to his house...it took him forever to go in the pool cuz it was cold at first..finally got him in...i loved being in his arms...we had our little fun...**2x***Dave couldn't get ova it....got out...ate a delicious meal his mother prepared us.

14) Watched some tv...eventually fell asleep...woke up around....9ish..told Dave he should drive me home cuz we were both so tired...nah..didn't happen....had some more fun ******and then he finally drove me home..got home around 10:15.


I couldn't ask for a nicer day with some great weather..we both agreed on though that since today was so great that we know something bad will happen. It always does.... 
<marquee>All in all...the day brought us closer...and its been a wonderful 2 years!</marquee>

1.Go into your LJ's archives.
2.Find your 23rd post (or closest to).
3.Find the fifth sentence (or closest to).
4.Post the text of the sentence in your blog along with these instructions.

It is pretty sad to say that I miss Walmart.

I wish I could get some of the attention from him that she gets...


Your bra is a SEXY bra!

Like you, your bra likes to titillate and tantalize.

You like see through bra's, and in the right mood you might even wear one with the nipples cut out ;)

Exploring the fine line between sexiness and slutty-ness is a favourite pastime of yours!

Another favourite pastime is bending over to pick something up you dropped "accidentally" and making sure people (guys, girls, it's all good) get a chance to look down your top and admire how sexy your bra really is.

Or more so, the package it encompasses....

I just one of the best movies I've seen this year...Hitch is such a great movie..I recommend it to anyone...some people say it is a date film but it's a just a good comedy. Will Smith is getting better with age...he is still as fine as eva. No work today...hung with dave for a little bit...just chilled at my house..it's nice to have a day to do nothing....found out that they want me to work tomorrow for a couple of hours on my day off...decided i should..i could always use the money..

i wish i had a digital camera..i need to take more pics..i used to always take them...and make tons of photo albums and scrapbooks...it seemed i gave up on that...damn...

Woke up still in pain...getting mad sick of it to tell you the truth...Dave showed up...and I guess I yelled at him too much and he got mad at me...I really don't think that I am that good of a g/f. We talked about it and made up...got to work late...I'm so happy when all my friends are working...work was busy as hell...later on towards closing time ...we had a mtg and my boy joe and I got talked to for goofing around too much and not getting our depts zoned like we should...I got upset...I work my ass off and no one recognizes it...I guess I'll try to zone more but I'm not gonna not talk to Joe...that's my homie...it's just me and him on the back of the store...we have to stick together....


Anywayz....hope everyone is doing alrite...

Dave made me wait for him to come over...made breakfast....went to work..which seemed extra long for some reason....my mommy got me wendy's #6 of course..and now I'm here still trying to figure out why my stomach hurts so much...it has been hurting for ova a week and it doesn't seem to be getting any better....I hope it isnt something really bad...I'm kinda scared...my ovaries hurt too....i pray everything is alrite...

You are a Radical. Right on!

I hope all of my friends are doing well...I haven't talked to anymore and that really sucks. My life is pretty predictable: work...and help dave get his CDL license. And I still sit here on my ass in little old Holbrook not knowing what the fuck to do with my life. It really sucks....I have no drive to do anything. It just seems like there is nothing out there for me. The only thing I feel strongly about is helping Dave with his dreams. I don't want to necessarily want to say that Dave is a distraction...I don't know what it is.


If anyone has any advice...let me know...I miss you all.. If anyone wants to hang out im off tues and weds...


Love you all!
Thanks for all my friends who came out to see me on Saturday. It was greatly apreciated...Linda...you are a sly dog....hahahahahahahaha

My eyes are burning from crying...It sucks...I can't sleep right now so I guess I'll write down my thoughts so I can tire myself out some how. Tonite..was good. Work was ...well...work...Got outta work. Plans changed of course for Dave and I. We hung out a little bit and he dropped me off at my house at 1. It didn't end there. We ended up talking till 230am about everything possible. He got real serious when he was talking to me too which was a little scary becuz he rarely gets serious like that. Dave started talking about all of his dreams for the future. He wants to have a house by the end of my college years. He figures he can get enough by working his ass off while I'm gone. He wishes I wasn't going so far to college but there is nothing he can do about it. "Who will I mess with when you're gone?", he asks me. That made me feel kind of sad. All he wants is to be happy which is what everyone wants. He got mad at me for disagreeing with him about the whole house thing. There were a few outbursts between the both of us. I cried a whole bunch of times. I'm such a wimp. It's pathetic. He told me he really wants to have a kid with me. He thinks that will make him happy. I told him he isn't financially prepared nor mature enough to handle the responsiblities of having a child. When I even decide to have a kid..we both need a steady job and a home. Toward the end of our conversation...he started staring into my eyes...dead serious..telling me that he wouldn't trade me for the world...he isn't going anywhere...he loves me more than I know. He started freaking me out in a weird way because it hit me completely that this guy is head ova heels in love with me. He told me that he had a crush on me for the longest time and even went out with a girl that looked similar to me to try and replace me some how but it didn't work. I wish people could see Dave for who is he. But I'm glad I get to be the lucky one to see all sides of him. "I know we both get aggrivated a lot at each other but I never could stay mad at you."-Dave I honestly never thought this relationship would last this long..cuz ya know this is my first try. I love him to pieces. I really want to be with him. He told me that there is no one else better for him then me. He truly cares for me...and it feels pretty good. I mean I know things are never going to be perfect..trust me I've found that out for myself. When you look in someone's eyes and know that they want to spend the rest of their life with you...it makes you feel.........damn..there are no words to suscribe it. "I'm sorry that I don't open up that much ...I've been hurt my girls before."-Dave My poor baby...I hope he knows I would never hurt him..... I hate fighting with him...and sometimes I am such a bitch to him.... He told me I have so much more potential...then working at Walmart...He thinks I should do something involving the computer..I'm glad he believes in me. He wants me to have a job that I am happy about. Basically.. he doesn't want me working at WalMart for the rest of my life. He wants so much for his life and I keep telling him that I'm so proud that he has goals but he shouldn't rush his life away. There's so many things that I wish I didn't rush through. I thought I would never be in love and when it finally happens, it is so strong I can barely control it. It's pretty bad when I hear a song and just start full out crying about Dave. (Angel of Mine-Monica). All those years of complaining and the first guy I go out with wants to make me his wife. Damn...I must be very special. People may have their own opinions about us. He doesn't support me finanically but he is my best friend and I love him with everything I have.. I don't know if crying this much is a good thing or not. "I would give you the world if I could."-Dave I can't remember everything that was said but I think that was the most important part.. Sometimes I wonder if I should ever go to college. My love life is so great right now...but my social life sucks becuz everyone is gone. I don't even dance anymore...how sad is that shit...that makes me even more depressed. I was crazy about dance...I was even going to major in and I guess ever since my surgery ...my passion for it just vanished. I hope everyone is doing well. It feels like I'm never going to see anyone..It sucks.

It's been a little while since I updated this. I know so many people are dying to know what I'm up to. The sad fact is I bet no one even looks at this. What can you do?



It fucking sucks that all my school friends are all at school. And what am I doing...working and not gaining knowledge. The only thing that I am proud of that is that Dave and I have been going out for 19 months..It's such an accomplishment for me because he is my first boyfriend. He told me that if we break up there will be no other for him. It's weird...our lives are so different but we are so much alike...



I wish I could go back to June and relive my high school graduation...all my friends were there. That was one of the most emotional days of my life. I never really thought about this before but I was never so sad and happy at the same time. I regret letting that day fly by..I remember all I kept thinking about that I had to go to work after the ceremony. That day was so profound...damn...I wish I could go back to that. Anyone agree??? Help me out here...


Hmmm..I need to call Howard University..but I have no motivation...I promised myself the end of the month and it is steadily approaching..This sucks.

You Are 24 Years Old
24
Under 12: You are a kid at heart. You still have an optimistic life view - and you look at the world with awe. 13-19: You are a teenager at heart. You question authority and are still trying to find your place in this world. 20-29: You are a twentysomething at heart. You feel excited about what's to come... love, work, and new experiences. 30-39: You are a thirtysomething at heart. You've had a taste of success and true love, but you want more! 40+: You are a mature adult. You've been through most of the ups and downs of life already. Now you get to sit back and relax.
What Age Do You Act?
What's up everyone...my life has been pretty redundant ever since I got back to work...All I basically do is work.....this routine is getting on my nerves just a tad bit....I need a little change ....that's all...is that so much to ask for...who knows? I hope everyone is doing well..i miss you all....

I'm so thrilled after I punch out from work...thinking how many more seconds i have to endure b4 I can lay in my bed..then when I eventually plop on my bed I have to hear constant yelling. It's getting to the point where it's like I don't want to even be at home. 
Life is a bitch.


Last nite was the WalMart Holiday Gathering..not too much fun. I won a prize...again. Last year I won a Gamecube and this year I got a dvd player..Works for me. Dave and I hung out for a couple of hours after leaving the party due to the fact that it was rather boring. We talked about a lot of things. I cried..about the stupidest things..He kept telling me that he wants no one else and that no one in this world is better than me. I'm just so worried that he we find someone better than me. He hates when I say that. He said I was perfect and no one is going to take him away from me. 


AHHHhhh...love is a bitch too..

What up world? It's been awhile I go back to work on the 30th which is a big step for me. After that I get my braces off on the 2nd. Oh yah..I want to major in social work now. Minor in dance cuz I don't know what happened to me in the hospital but I don't think I can handle all that dancing. I've been getting lots of pain in my right hip. Random sharp pains. It sucks. Whateva. I hope to see my friends soon. I love you and miss you all! Hey...boy it seems like I had the worst night possible...I fought with my best friend..we were both screaming at each other on the phone...never got in a fight like that..we were talking about if a girl cheats on her b/f. I said the b/f deserves to know everything no matter how much it will hurt. She said no woman should tell a guy that she played him. Just break up with him with the excuse of it not working out between them. My friend was just going to tell her b/f that it was not working out. She did that..but then called me and said that she fely so guilty that she was going to call him and tell him the truth. I was on the line when she told him. It was so hard for me to hear. She cried to me on the phone about what he said to her and all this stuff. Pretty hurtful words. She deserved it though. Then she started talking about how much she hates herself and how she doesn't want to be on the earth anymore. This started freaking me out. To be expected.
She put me on hold. When she finally came to back and I hate a male voice being cut off. I asked her who it was and she said it was her friend. Then, she started saying all these nice things to me, such as you have always been there for me and enjoy your life with your b/f and you have been such a great friend to me..this was fuckin scary. Then she said don't worry about me. Then there was silence. I kept saying hello and there was no reply.

I hung and said shes gonna hurt herself or even worse end her life. I can't let this happen. It was like one of those movies where the hurt girl calls her friends and tells them how much she loves them and then kills herself. I wasn't gonne let this happen. I called her back and she picked up the phone. I was balling my eyes out begging her not to do anything. That I needed her more she knows. Just trying to calm her down. After about 10 minutes of that..she stopped crying and I stopped crying...she called her other friend back and we talked on three way. We were trying to convince that everything will be all right. I know it was hard for her to hear. I felt so many emotions when she said if I hadn't called her back she really was going to do something to herself. That gave me such a weird feeling. Finally after a half an hour..she was back to laughing again.

What a night.....


I get to go see April this weekend. I'm happy.

Boy does it feel weird staying in Holbrook while all of my friends venture off in various cities. 

If any of you guys aren't busy just call my cell phone. I don't want to bother you all cuz I figure you're busy with all that homework mess. I miss everyone of you.

If anyone cares here's the update on my situation:

The incision looks good. Nice long scar to look at. I went to the doctor last week and she said that I can't go back to work yet. That pissed me off just a little. She told me that the outside of me might be all healed up but the inside isn't . I have to go see her again in the middle of October. I still don't know what is up with the college thing. I still want to go, I just don't know when. My mother wants me to take some night classes. 

It seems as I'm getting more depressed as the days go along.
Oh ..here I go complaining!

Well.. hope to hear from everyone soon.

Thanks to all my friends who have come and visited me in the hospital. The stuffed animals are adorable 

I ate food for the first time today since thursday nite. Muffin and grilled cheese.


I wanna go home.



It is pretty sad to say that I miss Walmart.


Hope all of my friends have fun in college!
Surgery on Monday..wish me luck. Out for 6 weeks. Woo freakin hoo. No school for me..what a bummer.

Aries - Your Horoscope for July 5 - 11
You desire comfort, security, and privacy now.

Spending some quality time with your family or by yourself at home is satisfying.

This is a time for going within to replenish yourself in order to meet the challenges and stresses of your life.

Domestic or family matters are key this week. What other people say can touch you deeply.

You also have the ability to express yourself with delicacy and get across complex points or ideas that are important to you.

This is a fortunate time for you, emotionally and possibly in other respects also.

It's also the perfect time for you to socialize.
